lines.text: Life is good - love is better.
My father treated prisoners like animals.
We all have a dark place, and I don't like to visit mine, but I will if I have to.
It's never gonna be over for me.
Splatter that son of a bitch!

[to her client Martin Kagan, who just shot Warden Munsey dead in front of her]
I hope you fry.
